data.title: üçÇ Honor Names
data.meta_description:
Hey everyone! :heart: 
I‚Äôve been thinking about honor names recently. Like, direct name honors, birthstones, birth months and even subtle honors. I know they aren‚Äôt everyone‚Äôs cup of tea, so I‚Äôd like to hear your opinion…
data.text:
just for fun!

All the honors on my UC, and what they‚Äôre honors for:

[name_f]Marilla[/name_f] - the [name_u]Anne[/name_u] of [name_u]Green[/name_u] Gables books, specifically [name_f]Rilla[/name_f] [name_u]Blythe[/name_u], Anne‚Äôs youngest daughter, who‚Äôs one of my favorite characters of all time

[name_f]Sunshine[/name_f] - my great-grandmother! I never got to meet her, but I grew up hearing stories about her, and she was one of my mom‚Äôs biggest influences/heroes when she was growing up. Grandma used to sing ‚ÄúYou Are [name_f]My[/name_f] Sunshine‚Äù to her grandchildren, and they all sang it at her funeral.

[name_u]Anne[/name_u] - [name_u]Anne[/name_u] [name_u]Shirley[/name_u], obviously!

[name_f]Caledonia[/name_f] - honors my Scottish heritage, and the song ‚ÄòCaledonia‚Äô (especially the Celtic Woman version!)

[name_f]Avonlea[/name_f] - the [name_u]Anne[/name_u] series, again.

[name_f]Christabel[/name_f] - my wonderful mother! Her name is [name_f]Krista[/name_f].

[name_f]Rose[/name_f] - honor for my two brothers born in [name_u]June[/name_u], as well as a nod to the [name_u]Taylor[/name_u] [name_m]Swift[/name_m] song, the lakes, from the lines ‚Äúa red rose grew up out of ice frozen ground/with no one around to tweet it‚Äù

[name_f]Daisy[/name_f] - for my brother, who was born in [name_f]April[/name_f]! Also a nod to the [name_u]Taylor[/name_u] [name_m]Swift[/name_m] song, You‚Äôre On Your Own, Kid.

[name_f]Melody[/name_f] - my grandmother‚Äôs name!

[name_f]Maud[/name_f] - [name_f]Lucy[/name_f] [name_f]Maud[/name_f] [name_u]Montgomery[/name_u], author of [name_u]Anne[/name_u] of [name_u]Green[/name_u] Gables.

[name_f]Wisteria[/name_f] - another the lakes nod! From the lines ‚ÄúI want to watch wisteria grow right over my bare feet/cause I haven‚Äôt moved in years.‚Äù

Glenrose - my dad and granddad‚Äôs name is [name_u]Glen[/name_u], and it‚Äôs also my little brother‚Äôs middle name!

[name_u]Blythe[/name_u] - yet another AoGG nod

[name_m]Oliver[/name_m] - for my good friend [name_u]Ollie[/name_u] (who‚Äôs name is also actually [name_m]Oliver[/name_m] lol)

[name_u]Jonah[/name_u] - my favorite Bible story!

[name_u]Bennett[/name_u] - my little brother‚Äôs middle name, which is also a family name.

[name_u]Glen[/name_u] - for my dad, granddad, and little brother.

[name_u]Curtis[/name_u] - my other brother‚Äôs middle name! It‚Äôs also my great-granddad‚Äôs name.

[name_u]August[/name_u] - partially for the [name_u]Taylor[/name_u] [name_m]Swift[/name_m] song, which is an honor for a friend who loves it.

[name_m]Christopher[/name_m] - another for my mom!

[name_u]Julian[/name_u] - for the character in RJ Palacio‚Äôs novel, White [name_u]Bird[/name_u], who‚Äôs an amazing example of selflessness, forgiveness, and love.

[name_u]Sparrow[/name_u] - the song Homeward Bound by [name_f]Marta[/name_f] [name_m]Keen[/name_m] has a lot of meaning to me, which is where [name_u]Sparrow[/name_u] comes from (there‚Äôs a line that talks about sparrows).

[name_m]Gilbert[/name_m] - [name_m]Gilbert[/name_m] [name_u]Blythe[/name_u], another one from the [name_u]Green[/name_u] Gables series!

[name_u]Larkspur[/name_u] - the birth flower for [name_u]July[/name_u], the month my dad was born. (I think the fact that it‚Äôs a poisonous plant makes even cooler haha)
